Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that "illegal aliens will receive $1,400 stimulus checks" without providing enough support or evidence for this statement.
Understate: The claim understates the fact that only individuals with a Social Security number can receive the stimulus checks, excluding the vast majority of immigrants who are in the country illegally.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support or evidence to back up the assertion that illegal aliens will receive stimulus checks.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that all illegal aliens will receive stimulus checks without considering the eligibility criteria, such as the requirement of having a Social Security number.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that only dependents of illegal aliens who have a Social Security number may receive stimulus payments, but not the illegal aliens themselves.
